channel.title: WealthWars... Will pay for script
channel.description:
Ok so you guys may or may not know about a game called Wealth Wars... Well it is a game that PAYS YOU to play it. So, I though a nice idea would be a SCAR script that would take the "tediousness" Out of clicking around the map all of those turns. I'm really not even sure if this is possible, but what I would hope for is: -Auto mountain searching -Auto Abandoned Base searching -Auto Spying... *If the base is weak enough to attack at your level, auto attacking
If it would be possible to make this script that would be great, I am willing to pay 1m RS2 for this (I only have 600k RS2 at the moment but I can make that 400k in a day of autoing). I need to KNOW that it works though, some kind of proof. Thanks.

item.title: WealthWars... Will pay for script
item.dc:creator: @Big_words Big words
item.description:
@Big_words wrote:

seifer225:

Im working on a wealthwars script, so far it moves randomly either north east south or west (not the same way it came) and searches bases and forests. Its also got randomd in place such as random mouse movements and click boxes, progress report and script ends when you have no moves left, MSN me or PM me we can sort something out.

It works, i’ve tested it

Read full topic

item.title: WealthWars... Will pay for script
item.dc:creator: @doomsday doomsday
item.description:
@doomsday wrote:

i wrote a tiny one

program New;

var
i:integer;

begin
activateclient;
repeat
i:=random(4)
wait(100)
if i=1 then clickmouse(573,259,true)
if i=2 then clickmouse(352,391,true)
if i=3 then clickmouse(818,392,true)
wait(2500)
clickmouse(720,537,true)
wait(2500)
until(false)
end.

simply clicks a random direction

it will search deserted bases and mountains

Read full topic

item.title: WealthWars... Will pay for script
item.dc:creator: @Arkanor Arkanor
item.description:
@Arkanor wrote:

bumps

I tried for a while to make a script. Brother, believe me when I say, it is not freaking easy. [size=1pt]And anyways the game is a piece of shit.[/size]

Here’s what I made before giving up in disgust - pretty much it’s just an automover. This was not coded to be shared with anyone, so I don’t know about compatibility. I use a rather HUGE screen resolution, so that might mess with your coords. In fact, it probably will, so you might have to repick some coords. I commented some stuff at the bottom that will help you in repicking coords - it’s pretty simple actually.

[code]/////////////////////////////////////////////////////
// Wealth Wars AutoMover v1.0 //
/////////////////////////////////////////////////////
//This script is used to create routes to optomize //
//searching. It is best if you are basing your //
//routes off a map, as you will be better able to //
//reach mountains and paying bases if you know //
//where they are. //
/////////////////////////////////////////////////////
//Yes, this is against the game rules. Use at your//
//own peril and don’t blame me. //
/////////////////////////////////////////////////////
//Note: Future Versions may be ‘auto-explorers’ //
//which record coords of player bases, mountains, //
//and deserted bases. //
/////////////////////////////////////////////////////
//DIRECTIONS: //
//Be sure that you have the non-resizable window. //
//Create your route in the main loop (very bottom //
//of the script. These procs control your moves: // //
////
//right; = move right, no search/attack. //
//up; = move up, no search/attack. //
//left; = move left, no search/attack. //
//down; = move down, no search/attack. //
//hitright; = move right, search/attack.//Broken? //
//hitup; = move up, search/attack. //broken? //
//hitleft; = move left, search/attack. //broken? //
//hitdown; = move down, search/attack. //broken? //
//returntobase; = returns to base. //
////
/////////////////////////////////////////////////////

program WealthWarsAutoMover;

procedure right;
begin
movemousesmooth(890+random(3),365+random(3));
wait(100+random(50));
clickmouse(890+random(3),365+random(3),true);
wait(1000+random(250));
repeat
wait(200);
until(getcolor(598,490)=13557726);
end;

procedure left;
begin
movemousesmooth(322+random(3),364+random(3));
wait(100+random(50));
clickmouse(322+random(3),364+random(3),true);
wait(1000+random(250));
repeat
wait(200);
until(getcolor(598,490)=13557726);
end;

procedure up;
begin
movemousesmooth(599+random(3),194+random(3));
wait(100+random(50));
clickmouse(599+random(3),194+random(3),true);
wait(1000+random(500));
repeat
wait(200);
until(getcolor(598,490)=13557726);
end;

procedure down;
begin
movemousesmooth(598+random(3),547+random(3));
wait(100+random(50));
clickmouse(598+random(3),547+random(3),true);
wait(1000+random(250));
repeat
wait(200);
until(getcolor(598,490)=13557726);
end;

procedure hitdown;
begin
movemousesmooth(598+random(3),547+random(3));
wait(100+random(50));
clickmouse(598+random(3),547+random(3),true);
wait(1000+random(250));
repeat
wait(200);
until(getcolor(598,490)=13557726);
movemouse(817+random(10),554+random(3));
wait(100+random(50));
clickmouse(817+random(10),554+random(3),true);
wait(1000+random(500));
repeat
wait(200);
until(getcolor(598,490)=13557726);
end;

procedure hitright;
begin
movemousesmooth(890+random(3),365+random(3));
wait(100+random(50));
clickmouse(890+random(3),365+random(3),true);
wait(1000+random(250));
repeat
wait(200);
until(getcolor(598,490)=13557726);
movemouse(817+random(10),554+random(3));
wait(100+random(50));
clickmouse(817+random(10),554+random(3),true);
wait(1000+random(500));
repeat
wait(200);
until(getcolor(598,490)=13557726);
end;

procedure hitleft;
begin
movemousesmooth(322+random(3),364+random(3));
wait(100+random(50));
clickmouse(322+random(3),364+random(3),true);
wait(1000+random(250));
repeat
wait(200);
until(getcolor(598,490)=13557726);
movemouse(817+random(10),554+random(3));
wait(100+random(50));
clickmouse(817+random(10),554+random(3),true);
wait(1000+random(500));
repeat
wait(200);
until(getcolor(598,490)=13557726);
end;

procedure hitup;
begin
movemousesmooth(599+random(3),194+random(3)); //moves mouse to button
wait(100+random(50));
clickmouse(599+random(3),194+random(3),true); //clicks button.
wait(1000+random(250));
repeat
wait(200);
until(getcolor(598,490)=13557726); //waits to find a color. I forget which color. This is supposed to be sure that the page has loaded.
movemouse(817+random(10),554+random(3)); //moves mouse to search button
wait(100+random(50));
clickmouse(817+random(10),554+random(3),true); //clicks search button.
wait(1000+random(500));
repeat
wait(200);
until(getcolor(598,490)=13557726); //waits to be sure page has loaded.
end;

procedure returntobase;
begin
movemousesmooth(405+random(3),189+random(3)); //moves to return to base
wait(100+random(50));
clickmouse(405+random(3),189+random(3),true); //clicks it.
wait(1000+random(250));
repeat
wait(200);
until(getcolor(598,490)=13557726); //looks for some color base-related.
end;

begin //this is the start of the main loop.

//your procedure layout goes here. I.e.:
{hitup;
left;
left;
left;
hitup;
hitup;}
{Be aware that it does not attack player bases -
coords are different. So you’ll have to manually code
for a hit on bases. Pick coords, use ‘clickmouse’, etc.}

end.[/code]

Read full topic
